job.name: Freelance Web Page Implementation / Maintenance / Upkeep

skills.name: Created software that manages servers in the Cloud
Implemented various client websites with the requirements of: Speed, compatibility, legacy support, graphic presence, branding, and ease of use
Hired designers when appropriate to deliver the best end-result
Created aggressive budgets, and held to them
Create training material to educate staff on how to maintain the website and update content
skills.description:
- Created screen-capture video training
- Created multi-page PDF documentation
- Created presentations and presented the material to staff in-person
